title: Collections API create command should block until collections is ready to process search and index requests
description: Collections API CREATE command should block until collection is ready to process search and index requests, e.g. at least one replica for every shard is ready to process requests?

comments.author: Varun Thacker
comments.content:
Hi Alexey,

I am marking this issue a duplicate of SOLR-8416 . Ideally it should have been the other way around but since there's been activity there I don't want to close that issue
